summary.para: Performs the continuously differentiable exponential linear unit (CELU) activation function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: f(x) = max(0, x) + min(0, Alpha * (exp(x / Alpha) - 1));

item.description: exp(x) is the natural exponentiation function
max(a,b) returns the larger of the two values a,b
min(a,b) returns the smaller of the two values a,b

summary.para: This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.
The input tensor to read from.
The output tensor to write the results to.
The alpha coefficient. A typical default for this value is 1.0.
